text: hi guys it's angel welcome to my kitchen
favorites holiday edition video and

with that let's get started
favorite number one are silicone lid
lifters by tavolo they come in a set of
three sheep two white and one black
there's also other colors too on the
bottom of each sheep there's a notch
that allows them to securely rest on the

keep your pots from boiling over
plus they're super cute and the perfect
size for stocking stuffers since we're
talking about stocking stuffers check
out my favorite number two they're the
body
bottle covers think of it like a sock
for your small water bottles it's a cute

and if the waters cold and you want to

stuff dry they're sold individually and
come in different colors to favorite
number three is the macaron kit I think
this is such a cute box set because it

it has piping tips three food coloring

the one I have is an enameled cast iron

if you've cooked with regular tongs

they come in a box of two and it's made

- favorite number nine is a nifty gadget

this just makes it easier for me to do

last but not least my ultimate favorite
it's the green tea latte maker okay it's
actually an espresso automatic milk
frother but here's how I get it to make
me green tea lattes first fill up the
machine with your choice of cold milk
add a few teaspoons of matcha powder to
taste cover with the lid and press the
button and the Machine will start to
whisk the milk and match it together and
heat up the milk so it's nice and hot it
only takes a few minutes but it's really
very cool to watch after it's done
it'll shut off itself then I like to
dissolve a few teaspoons of cane sugar
with a bit of hot water pour in your
matcha whist milk and of course don't
forget the whipped cream topping voila
the perfect green tea latte maker if you
don't have one of these at home already
consider making this a holiday gift to
